name: Clickermine
description:
A clicker game, click away at ores and stone, you can also upgrade your pickaxe!

When you clear the whole mine, you can generate a new one to continue.

Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Mine

Tab - Upgrade screen

Connect with us on Discord to chat, leave feedback or tell your idea for a game.
